text: I'm looking for a CTO or a lead engineer for my early stage startup. It's a community marketplace for childhood education. We're Brooklyn Based and one month in have already generated almost half a million in sales and built a community of 9,000 parents and teachers with one founder/employee. I'm a female founder and would love to interview some strong female engineers, but am of course open to all applicants. Would love to find someone with a lot of vision and knowledge about education. Http://www.cottageclass.com
